attributes.action: make First Aid a required subject as part of the National Curriculum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We should all be competent in First Aid and a first step to this would be to make it part of the National Curriculum and require all children to learn it and become qualified First Aiders. In addition, adults could be encouraged to sign up for courses too and these could be subsidised in some cases.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "make First Aid a required subject as part of the National Curriculum."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11471.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/First-Aid/
